txt.en:
'So you want to learn the ways of the burglar? Well, I'm the trainer for you! I don't mind sharing a few tricks with you, but before I do, there's a bit of advice.

'Before getting into a fight, study your enemy's weaknesses, for they can often be used against him. Approaching a foe from Stealth allows many of your attacks to be more potent. Also, never forget that your enemy's greatest weakness is his mind, more often than not.

'Show me me you've learned my lessons. <rgb=#00ff00>Approach the Training-dummy nearby, and strike it with Surprise Strike.</rgb>'

<rgb=#00ff00>HINT:

Burglars benefit greatly from <rgb=#ffff00>Critical Strikes</rgb> and <rgb=#ffff00>Devastating Blows</rgb>. Scoring such hits will allow them to use special skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Double-edged Strike</rgb>. In addition, many Burglar skills benefit from being in <rgb=#ffff00>Stealth</rgb>.

Try attacking a <rgb=#ff0000>training-dummy</rgb> from <rgb=#ffff00>Stealth</rgb> with <rgb=#ffff00>Surprise Strike</rgb> to inflict even more damage. </rgb>
'Well done, [placeholder]! As you grow, you will learn even more powerful new skills to use in battle. Good luck!'

'Strike the training-dummy with your new skill and return to me. We must make certain that you are prepared to properly wield a blade.'

<rgb=#00ff00>HINT:

Burglars benefit greatly from <rgb=#ffff00>Critical Strikes</rgb> and <rgb=#ffff00>Devastating Blows</rgb>. Scoring such hits will allow them to use special skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Double-edged Strike</rgb>. In addition, many Burglar skills benefit from being in <rgb=#ffff00>Stealth</rgb>.

Try attacking a <rgb=#ff0000>training-dummy</rgb> from <rgb=#ffff00>Stealth</rgb> with <rgb=#ffff00>Surprise Strike</rgb> to inflict even more damage. </rgb>
Your trainer wants you to use your new skills to prove that you are ready to face the many dangers that exist in the world.
You have struck the training-dummy with Surprise Strike
Strike the training-dummy with Surprise Strike

Enter Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Surprise Strike</rgb> skill against the nearby training dummy.

<rgb=#00ff00>HINT:

Burglars benefit greatly from <rgb=#ffff00>Critical Strikes</rgb> and <rgb=#ffff00>Devastating Blows</rgb>. Scoring such hits will allow them to use special skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Double-edged Strike</rgb>. In addition, many Burglar skills benefit from being in <rgb=#ffff00>Stealth</rgb>.

Try attacking a <rgb=#ff0000>training-dummy</rgb> from <rgb=#ffff00>Stealth</rgb> with <rgb=#ffff00>Surprise Strike</rgb> to inflict even more damage. </rgb>
Talk to the Burglar Trainer in Archet
The Burglar Trainer is in Archet, west of the training grounds.\n\nNow that you have successfully used your Surprise Strike, you should return to your trainer and tell him of your success.
